questions.questionText: In the 'Back To the Future' trilogy, at what speed does the DeLorean need to be going to travel through time?
Which is the James Bond film that features the classic line, 'No Mr. Bond, I expect you to die' ?
What national monument do Cary Grant and Eva Marie Saint find themselves nearly falling off of in 'North by Northwest'?
Complete the quote from 'Mean Girls': "On Wednesdays, ______ "

answers.3: We do mean things, because we are very mean girls. Hence, the title for the film you are currently watching!

questions.questionText: From the movie 'Gremlins' Which is NOT one of the rules for taking care of a Mogwai?

answers.4: Don't expose them to bright light.

questions.questionText: What is the name of Charles Foster Kane's mansion in 'Citizen Kane'?
Which of these Disney Films was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Picture?

answers.1: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

questions.questionText: Which of these Meg Ryan Romantic Comedies does not co-star Tom Hanks?
Which Band provided the soundtrack for the cult classic film, 'Highlander'?
'The Sound of Music' director Robert Wise also directed which '50s Sci-fi classic?

answers.1: The Day the Earth Stood Still
answers.4: The Sound of Music but with Robots and Aliens

players.name: Baby
players.message: These questions nearly had me in a corner
